{{cpp/chrono/year/title|1=is_leap}}
{{cpp/chrono/year/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
constexpr bool is_leap() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Determines if {{c|*this}} represents a leap year in the [[enwiki:Proleptic_Gregorian_calendar|proleptic Gregorian calendar]].

{{c|*this}} represents a leap year if the stored year value
* is divisible by 4 and not divisible by 100; or
* is divisible by 400.

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if {{c|*this}} represents a leap year, otherwise {{c|false}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    using namespace std::chrono_literals;
    for (const std::chrono::year y : {2020y, 2021y, 2000y, 3000y})
    {
        if (const int iy{static_cast&lt;int&gt;(y)}; y.is_leap())
            std::cout &lt;&lt; iy &lt;&lt; " is a leap year because it is divisible by "
                      &lt;&lt; (iy % 400 == 0 ? "400\n" : "4 and not divisible by 100\n");
        else
            std::cout &lt;&lt; iy &lt;&lt; " is not a leap year\n";
    }
}
|output=
2020 is a leap year because it is divisible by 4 and not divisible by 100
2021 is not a leap year
2000 is a leap year because it is divisible by 400
3000 is not a leap year
}}
